mapper.sql: user_id, nick_Name, phone_Num, img_Url, city_Name, pass_Word, carbon_Coin
mapper.select: select * from appuser where carbon_Coin between #{lower} and #{upper};
mapper.insert: insert into appuser (user_id, nick_Name, phone_Num, img_Url, city_Name, pass_Word, carbon_Coin) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carbonCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into appuser
user_id,
nick_Name,
phone_Num,
img_Url,
city_Name,
pass_Word,
carbon_Coin,

mapper.update:
update appuser
nick_Name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_Num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_Url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_Name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_Word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carbon_Coin = #{carbonCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update appuser set nick_Name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_Num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_Url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_Name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_Word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carbon_Coin = #{carbonCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
